Who we are

Get to know our company

Established in 2021, Rockway International Ltd started procurement of specialized equipment, seizing the opportunity to venture in the healthcare products and solutions trading at the height of the global COVID-19 pandemic.

The focus expanded to the provision of strategic advisory services and procurement assistance to clients in the healthcare, building construction, and oil and gas sectors.
